verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וָשֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H7651><s%> va-She-va' and seventh שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> le-ya-ra-ve-'Am of Jeroboam מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach to reign עֲזַרְיָ֥ה <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah began Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- son אֲמַצְיָ֖ה <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Yah of Amaziah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שֵׁ֨שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho, was he when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim two שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother's יְכָלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3203><s%> ye-chal-Ya-hu [was] Jecholiah מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> mi-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Ya-hu Amaziah אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. according to all that his father

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot Save that the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru; were not removed ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> me-zab-be-Chim sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> bab-ba-Mot. still on the high places

וַיְנַגַּ֨ע <S%H5060><s%> vay-nag-Ga' smote יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מְצֹרָע֙ <S%H6879><s%> me-tzo-Ra' so that he was a leper עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom unto the day מֹת֔וֹ <S%H4194><s%> mo-To, of his death וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit house הַחָפְשִׁ֑ית <S%H2669><s%> ha-cha-fe-Shit; in a several וְיוֹתָ֤ם <S%H3147><s%> ve-yo-Tam And Jotham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- was over הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, [was] over the house שֹׁפֵ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> sho-Fet judging אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav slept עֲזַרְיָה֙ <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah So Azariah עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav, with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru and they buried אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav him with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir in the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch reigned יוֹתָ֥ם <S%H3147><s%> yo-Tam and Jotham בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place פ Peh

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty וּשְׁמֹנֶה֙ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Neh and eighth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year לַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H5838><s%> la-'a-zar-Ya-hu of Azariah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> Ma-lach reign זְכַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Ya-hu did Zachariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am of Jeroboam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El over Israel בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> be-sho-me-Ron in Samaria שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah six חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> cho-da-Shim. months

וַיִּקְשֹׁ֤ר <S%H7194><s%> vai-yik-Shor conspired עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav against שַׁלֻּ֣ם <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum And Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יָבֵ֔שׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Vesh, of Jabesh וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ke-hu against him and smote קָֽבָלְ־ <S%H6904><s%> ka-val-'Am before עָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am the people וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> vay-mi-Te-hu; and slew וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch him and reigned תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu This דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- This [was] the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu unto Jehu לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Thy sons רְבִיעִ֔ים <S%H7243><s%> re-vi-'Im, unto the fourth יֵשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-Vu shall sit לְךָ֖ le-Cha עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- become כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. and so פ Peh
